translation.en: DOCUMENTARY FILMMAKER: Antarctica.
An inhospitable wasteland.
But even here, on the Earth's frozen bottom,
we find life.
translation.ko: 하지만 지구 최남단 이곳에도 생명체가 있습니다

translation.en: (wind whistling)
And not just any life.
Penguins.
(penguins laughing) Joyous, frolicking, waddling,
cute and cuddly life.
(chuckles) Look at them tumbling onto their chubby bum-bums.
Who could take these frisky little snow clowns...
Seriously?
Does anyone even know where we're marching to?
Who cares? I question nothing.
Me, too. Me, too. Well, fine!
We'll just fly to the front of the line and see for ourselves.
translation.ko: 그럼 우리가 날아가서 어디 가는지 알아보자

translation.en: Kowalski! Rico! Engage aerial surveillance.
Here we go! Doing it! Come on!
Skipper, we appear to be flightless.
Aw, well, what's the point of these?
translation.ko: 우린 비행펭귄이 아니잖아요 이건 왜 있는데?

translation.en: Whoa! I like it!
Hey, this could be our thing!
What are we gonna call it? Let's call it the, uh... "high one."
(gasping) Hey! Anybody see that? That's an egg!
Is someone gonna go get it? W-We can't do that.
Why not? Well, it's a dangerous world
out there, and we're just penguins.
translation.ko: 거긴 위험해 우린 한낱 펭귄이야 귀여우면 그만이야

translation.en: You know, nothing but cute and cuddly.
Yeah. Why do you think there are always documentary crews filming us?
Well, sorry, kid. You know, we lose a few eggs every year. It's just nature.
translation.ko: 우린 매년 알을 잃어 대자연의 섭리야

translation.en: Oh, right, nature. I guess that makes sense, but...
translation.ko: 그래, 대자연 알 것 같지만 동시에

translation.en: something... something deep down in my gut tells me
that it-it makes no sense at all.
You know what? I reject nature!
Who's with me?!
The old ship. No one's ever returned from there alive.
SKIPPER: Relax, Kowalski. There's a bird down there now.
Look, he's fine. (others gasp)
Leopard seals-- nature's snakes.
Aren't snakes nature's snakes?
How should I know? I live on the flipping frozen tundra.
translation.ko: 내가 어떻게 알아? 난 남극에 있잖아

translation.en: Give me a way down there, ASAP!
All one would have to do is collect 300 feet of kelp,
translation.ko: 알을 노린다. 구해줄 방법 말해봐 미역을 91m 꼬아서 밧줄로 만들고...

translation.en: dry it in the... Tiny and helpless,
the baby penguins are frozen with fear.
They know if they fall from this cliff,
translation.ko: 겁에 질려 있군요 떨어지면 죽는다는 걸 알 겁니다

translation.en: they will surely die.
Gunter, give them a shove.
we've trained to obey simple voice commands. (penguins yell)
Now, that's more like it!
That-a-boy, Rico!
SKIPPER: Don't let him have it!
Okay. I guess that works. (seal growls)
KOWALSKI: Get to high ground!
SKIPPER: Boo-yah! KOWALSKI: Ha-ha! Success! Oh.
KOWALSKI: I'd recommend firing it now. Nope, hold on.
Uh, we really should fire it. Not till we see the white of its eyes.
They're mostly pupil. Very little white. Almost none!
translation.ko: 전부 까만 동공이고 흰색은 거의 없습니다

translation.en: They got to have a little bit of white, right?
None whatsoever. What if they look really far to the left?
SKIPPER: Fire in the hole!
Kowalski, analysis?
We are really awesome at this.
Boys, we did it! Mission accomplished!
Hey, hey, we can do our thing. High one!
translation.ko: 우리 꺼 또 하자. 하이 원

translation.en: Yes!
Ooh. My bad. (gasps) Uh-oh.
Look. It's... it's the miracle of birth.
A moment... of extraordinary beauty.
Oh, that's disgusting! I think I have amniotic sac in my mouth!
translation.ko: 역겨워 입에서 태아가 꿈틀대는 거 같아

translation.en: Hello. Are you my family?
You don't have a family, and we're all going to die. Sorry.
translation.ko: 넌 가족 없어. 우린 곧 죽어, 미안

translation.en: Wh-What?
What? I-I thought that was what we were all nodding about.
No one's gonna die!
Know what you've got, kid? You've got us.
We've got each other.
translation.ko: 너한텐 뭐가 있을까? 우리가 있단다 우린 서로를 지켜줄 거야

translation.en: So adorable. Kowalski,
what's our trajectory?
95% certain we're still doomed.
And the, uh, other five percent?
KOWALSKI: Adventure and glory like no penguins have ever seen before.
translation.ko: 어떤 펭귄도 못 누린 모험과 영광

translation.en: I'll take that action. But where are we going?
SKIPPER: The future, boys. Glorious future!
SKIPPER: Ah, that song!
translation.ko: "찬란한 미래로" 저 노래, 토할 것만 같아

translation.en: I swear it's gonna make me lose my salmon.
Singing getting louder, Skipper! Then move faster!
translation.ko: - 노래가 커집니다 - 그럼 더 빨리 움직여

translation.en: Somebody get that wig off Private.
Kowalski, status report!
I'm really getting tired of this song.
SKIPPER: Well, the best part of owning a circus

Ten years ago on this very day,
a tiny egg hatched, and our world
translation.ko: 10년 전 오늘, 작은 알이 부화했고 우리의 세상은 더 깜찍해졌지

translation.en: got a little bit cuter. (giggles)
So tonight, Private, we celebrate your birthday

translation.ko: 중앙 금고를 털거야 목표는 '포트 녹스' 멋져요

translation.en: What? There she is, boys.
The object of our unholy desire.
The butter on our biscuit. The royal flush.
PRIVATE: Skipper? Private,
translation.ko: - 로얄 플러쉬 - 대장님? 한창 발동 거는데 찬물 끼얹으려고?

translation.en: what's our rule about interrupting analogies?

translation.en: No, sir. Too bad.
'Cause I respect a soldier with some moxie.
translation.ko: 난 따질 건 따지는 부하가 좋아

translation.en: Really? Then I really think we should... Whoa, whoa, whoa. Dial back the moxie, sass-mouth.

translation.en: (chuckles): Oh, look at you. Still so adorable.
SKIPPER: Fire in the hole!
FEMALE VOICE: 8:00. Night-night time.
Wha...? (men gasping)
Private, come on!
AUTOMATED MALE VOICE: Please enter pass code. Kowalski, you're up.
AUTOMATED MALE VOICE: Please enter pass code. Rico, sonic incursion device.
Oh, come on, you're kidding right?
Kentucky, Skipper. They do love their Flatt and Scruggs.
AUTOMATED MALE VOICE: Y'all come in now, y'hear? Have yourself a iced tea.
Private, if you could have anything you wanted in the whole wide world,
what would it be? Well, gee, Skipper,
I think to be a meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.ko: 쓸모 있고 밥값도 하는 멤버가 될래요

translation.en: Ah. Well, we got you something else.
A vending machine? Well, not just any vending machine, Private.
The last remaining home in America's nanny state
translation.ko: 보안과 감시가 철통 같은 이곳 자판기야

translation.en: for those succulent but chemically hazardous bits of puffed heaven called...
PRIVATE: (gasps) Cheezy Dibbles!
Happy ding-dong birthday, you little scamp!
Oh-ho-ho! Oh-ho, thank you!
You mess with the bull, you're gonna get the horns, Private.

translation.en: Now, hit that machine and get your present.
We just broke into the most secure facility in North America.
translation.ko: 우린 미국에서 가장 철통 같은 델 와있어

translation.en: You know what that means? We're wanted criminals
translation.ko: 우린 미국에서 가장 철통 같은 델 와있어 무슨 뜻인지 알아?

translation.en: who'll be on the lam the rest of our lives,
always feeling the hot breath of Johnny Law on our necks?
SKIPPER: No! It means, as elite units go,
translation.ko: 붙잡히는 악몽에 시달리는 거요? 땡, 우린 고수 중에서 최고수란 뜻이고

translation.en: we're the elitest of the elite.
translation.ko: 땡, 우린 고수 중에서 최고수란 뜻이고

translation.en: (Private gasping) Top shelf in the bureau.
translation.ko: 땡, 우린 고수 중에서 최고수란 뜻이고 베스트 중에 베스트란 뜻이지

translation.en: The penultimate, plus one.
Where'd Private go?
Oh, there he is. D-3.
Oh, Private. How much is he? He's $3.50, sir.
Well, that's outrageous. Even for Private.
Sir, the machine is alive!
I don't think I like your attitude, vending machine.
translation.ko: 너의 태도가 아주 맘에 안 든다

translation.en: Or your prices! Release them!
What the...?
Kowalski, analysis. All evidence indicates... (stomach gurgling)
I ate too many Cheezy Dibbles.
We're behind enemy lines and incredibly thirsty.
Rico, bust us out of this delicious prison.
translation.ko: 리코, 이 맛난 감옥에서 우릴 꺼내줘

translation.en: Nice work, Rico. Ha-ha!
You are a meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.ko: 넌 쓸모 있고, 밥값도 하는 멤버야

translation.en: SKIPPER: Private, quit lollygagging. And regular gagging.
Dark and ominous-- two of my least favorite traits in a room.
Oh, look! A button. Huh? Private, don't!
Now, what have I told you about... Sorry, what?
It looks like some sort of giant laser sent to kill us all, sir.
ALL: No!
(singsongy): Naughty, naughty.
Pretty birds belong in their cages.

translation.en: Now, that's just hurtful.
And I was so happy to see you again.

translation.en: Skipper... Kowalski... Rico...

Who are you?

by a different, much older name.

A phantom! A shadow of a former life!
Dave!
Sorry, sir, no clue.
Dave...!
Dave! Dave...!
Dave? Dave...!
Dave. Dave!
Sorry. Wait. Wait. Uh...
I... I live this way.
Go ahead, Dan, continue.
You seriously don't remember me?
Dave! Dave! Right! Oh, yeah, long time.
Uh... how's the wife?
I've never been married.
You may not remember me, but I could never forget you.

New York City.
The Central Park Zoo.
Life was good. (children laughing)
Roomy tank, great location,
monkey-house views.
And, of course... (children gasp)
my adoring legion of fans.
Cool. Dave!
The octopus of a thousand tricks.
Awesome!
I was the total package.
GIRL: Wow. MAN: Hey, kids!
You got to see this. Get up here quick!

translation.en: And then you arrived.
WOMAN: Oh, they're so adorable! (crowd cheering)
Just, uh, smile and wave, boys. Smile and wave.
And took everything from me. GIRL: They're so cute!
translation.ko: - 내 모든 걸 앗아갔어 - 무척 사랑스러워

translation.en: They are so adorable. WOMAN: Have you ever seen anything cuter?

translation.en: Four adorable baby penguins.
With you around, no one wanted an old octopus anymore.
translation.ko: 네놈들이 온 뒤로 날 거들떠도 안 봤어

translation.en: "Out you go, Dave." (engine starts)
And so it went, over and over,

translation.en: at zoo after aquarium. Dad, look!
I can't see the penguins, man!
Adorable penguins stole the show. MAN: Whoo! Yeah!
While I was shunned.
Forgotten.
Unwanted.
Alone.
That sounds awful.
Oh, it was.
I came to realize
translation.ko: 그랬지 너희가 사랑을 독식하며 더운밥을 먹을 때

translation.en: some creatures are born to get all the love.
translation.ko: 너희가 사랑을 독식하며 더운밥을 먹을 때

translation.en: The rest of us get nothing!
The only thing that has kept me going all these years is my

Oh, Daryl, Daryl, Daryl, you can't blame us for what happened to you.

Crikey!
Nicolas, cage them.

Because we are an elite unit, the best of the best.
Cream of the corn on a platinum cob.
And we're gonna take your deadly green goop and sashay right out the exit hatch.

Deploy secret weapon.
Aah! The cheese, it burns! (octopi burbling) Roll out.

(octopus burbles) Kowalski, be my eyes. Uh, left. (grunts)
KOWALSKI: Right, right! Up!
Duck.

translation.en: Excelente.
Skipper! KOWALSKI: They're back up.
And we are running out of canal. Parker Posey! Go all-terrain.
Will you marry me? Huh?
We've lost engine one!
(grunts) And two and three.
Four! (woman screams)
(laughs) Switch to emergency power. Aye, aye, Skipper. (engine revving)
PRIVATE: We've got melons! Dead ahead!
I can see.
Rico, the glowy thing! (grunts)

Wow.
Sorry for underestimating the plan, Skipper.
It's okay, Kowalski.

Now, what the heck is going on?!

Oh, my gosh.
Aw, you guys are so cute.

The North Wind is an elite under...

...task...
...force, dedicated to help...
helping...

(groans) Dedi...

translation.en: Cute. And cuddly.

(beeping)

All right, tiny penguins, the best way for the North Wind

Now, you were inside his sub, so I need to know everything you know.

We should kiss. Plan-off.

In order to reverse the ray,

Make a hole! Make a hole!
(Private yells)
KOWALSKI: Don't worry, uh... a-a chrysalis
translation.ko: 걱정 마 번데기가 되는 거야. 그럴 수 있어

translation.en: is just forming around you. That's perfectly normal.
translation.ko: 번데기가 되는 거야. 그럴 수 있어

translation.en: Private. (Rico whimpering)
Private?
Oh! Look at that! Majestic.
Hello.
Oh! Hey! (grunts)
What's wrong? What are you... Look out for the... Whoa, now. Have I got something...
Okay, looking up. Cover your eyes.
Is there a... thing? Don't turn your head.
So... (light chuckle) how do I look?
You're hideously disfigured and will probably be hunted for sport.
Wh-Wha...? What?
If there's anything we've learned from this delightful adventure-- Kowalski--
it's that looks don't matter.
It's what you do that counts.
And look at what you did.
Yes, sir...
you are the most meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.ko: 넌 쓸모 있고 밥값도 하는 대원이야

translation.en: Way to go, Private! Attaboy!
Nicely done.
You did it! We're so proud of you!
You saved us! We love you, Private!
Yeah, we love you! You the penguin!
Ramirez!
Dave. Dave!
What? Are you kidding me?!
(Dave groans) Dave. Oh-ho, look at you. You think this is over?
translation.ko: - 데이브, 꼴 좋군 - 끝난 줄 알았지?

translation.en: I'm just getting started. I'm about to...
translation.ko: - 데이브, 꼴 좋군 - 끝난 줄 알았지? - 난 지금부터 시작이야 - 문어를 어떻게 할 거죠?

translation.en: What do we do with him now?
translation.ko: - 난 지금부터 시작이야 - 문어를 어떻게 할 거죠?

translation.en: GIRL: Aw... DAVE: Open this right now!
Here you go, kid.
(distorted): Cool!
I hope you find happiness, Dave.
It's snowing! It's snowing! It's snowing! It's snowing! (Dave grunting frantically) It's snowing! It's snowing...
Right, now, then...
uh, um, this is difficult for me to say.
translation.ko: 자, 이제 이런 말 하기 쉽지 않은데

translation.en: Is it "osteoporosis"? You just got to lean into the vowel.
Os-teo... poro... No! No.
I want to say... you four are the bravest agents I've ever known.
translation.ko: 너희는 내가 본 요원 중 가장 용감해

translation.en: The point is...
I was wrong about you, and I hope...
there's some way I can make it right.
Give us jet packs. We should kiss. Whoa. Uh... (clears throat)
Did... did you just say...
Well, that feels right!
I think I'd actually prefer a jet pack, please.
Ooh. I think we should go with Private's idea.
Kowalski! What's our trajectory?
95% certain this will end in massive... flaming disaster!
And the other five percent? Irrelevant, sir!
Jet packs are awesome!
SKIPPER: Agreed!
Who says penguins can't fly?
translation.ko: 누가 펭귄은 날 수 없다고 했죠?

translation.en: PRIVATE: Um, Skipper, we are going to turn me back to normal, right?
SKIPPER: Absolutely. First thing Monday.
Whee! I'm in a rocket ship!
I want to push the button.
Give me that! Hey! Stealer!
Let's do this! I'm ready!
Okay, on three. One, three, go. Ow!
I'm just gonna do a little practice push. Aah!
Okay, I'm not going to press it. Why are you
smacking my hand? Hey, look over there!
translation.ko: 내 손 왜 치는데? 저거 봐

translation.en: (zapping) I'm a laser show.
Julien! (groans, grunts)
Hey! Now, that's the Private we know and love.
High one!
Immeasurable cuteness,
right there! Good to be back.
I feel like a French fry!
Whoa! I'm okay!
And with cuteness to spare!
Come on! Frosty mugs of herring juice all around!
translation.ko: 청어 주스가 담긴 시원한 잔을 돌려

translation.en: SKIPPER: Private's buying. PRIVATE: What?
